titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn Treasurer and City Court Clerk records 1985.089
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:18:47 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Brooklyn Treasurer and City Court Clerk receipt books
did.abstract: This collection contains a receipt book of the Village of Brooklyn with entries for payments by John S. Doughty Jr., the Village Treasurer, dated 1827. Also included is a receipt book of the City Court Clerk of the City of Brooklyn with entries for payments to court officers, dated 1869

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn Treasurer and City Court Clerk records, 1985.089, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Purchased from the New York Bound Bookshop, 1985.
